decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s): Design and Access Statement; Heritage Statement; 005 LOCATION PLAN; 006 SITE PLAN; 010 EXISTING | GROUND FLOOR; 011 EXISTING | FIRST FLOOR; 012 EXISTING | SECOND FLOOR; 013 EXISTING | ROOF PLAN; 015 SITE PLAN ALL SAINTS CHURCH | EXISTING SITUATION; 016 SITE PLAN ALL SAINTS CHURCH | PROPOSAL SITUATION; 017 ALL SAINTS CHURCH | EXISTING SECTION; 018 ALL SAINTS CHURCH PROPOSED SECTION; 020 EXISTING | FRONT FAÇADE; 021 EXISTING | REAR FAÇADE; 022 EXISTING | EAST FAÇADE; 023 EXISTING | WEST FAÇADE; 030 EXISTING | LONGITUDINAL SECTION A; 031 EXISTING | CROSS SECTION B; 100D PROPOSAL | GROUND FLOOR; 110D PROPOSAL | FIRST FLOOR; 120D PROPOSAL | SECOND FLOOR_NO CHANGES; 130D PROPOSAL | ROOF PLAN; 200D PROPOSAL | FRONT FAÇADE; 210D PROPOSAL | REAR FAÇADE; 220D PROPOSAL | EAST FAÇADE; 230D PROPOSAL | WEST FAÇADE; 300D PROPOSAL | LONGITUDINAL SECTION A; 310D PROPOSAL | CROSS SECTION B
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
description: Two storey side extension (following demolition of existing garage), and single storey rear/side extension
